history.info: 14.6 data, QoL
14.5 data, fix bugs, apply treasure/level/colosseum effects to unit bases
14.4 data, make blast attacks more BC-Accurate, popout music player, allow skipping certain packs from loading on startup, fix bugs & QoL changes
No longer crashes when failing to generate editor + more precise error logging, fix Adv Proc Filter being unusable in lineup page, Mini-death surge talent, maybe quicker pack/data loading

Fix TBA increasing making units not attack, unfunctional temporary asset removal, improve AI/Blessing proc and editor menus, allow more than 2 sound effects for attacks, fix everywhere door not working on bosses, Madoka TF soul, allow non-dojo stages to spawn enemies at specific HP by setting max base HP above 100%, Surge Immune + Countersurge made doable, Add support for custom fonts, Fix 60 fps mode not updating in anim viewers when set via toolbar

Fix orb-related crashes, restructure everywhere door, fix erroneous calculation on progressive strengthen, more summon animation types, Fix bugs on the revival UI, Implement pack parenting, fix a single error generating many log files
14.3 data, fix bugs, tweak everywhere door & auto-updater
Bugfixes, QoL, Adrenaline
14.2 data, fix 4th form Orbs not working
Fix bugs, improve Moving Atk ID system
Fix breakerblast crash, make dire/easing editing more straightforward
Adds new procs, fix visual bugs
14.0 content, fix bugs
Fix blast range, improve drawing, make modification 51 usable, add modification 54
Fix bugs, fix choppy border pixels, 13.7 data, anim QoL
Fix bugs, adds Zero Form icons & timeSlow effect for freeze, auto-download forked assets
13.6 content, new colosseum restrictions, set colosseum restrictions to stages, HTML support for descriptions, fix bugs
Lots of QoL, bugfixes, and mechanic updates, specially around progression
Adds 13.5 data, decimal procs and boss baseBarrier (for custom stages only)
13.2 and 13.3 Data

13.1 Data, Allow CDSetter ability to affect all slots by setting slot to 11, allow Wave/Surgeblockers to take damage from what they block by setting mult to negative, QoL and BugFixes (Hey where did 0-6-1-11 go)
The usual
Bug Fixes, corrupt animation detection, localization QoL
Bug Fixes, 60fps, other stuff
Bug Fixes
A lot of QoL and Bugfixes, and TypeShield proc (Increases Core Version)
Allow 0 share for multi-atks and 12.5 content
Fixes bugs, allow music naming and other music-related QoL
Merge DMG Dealt+ abilities and DMG taken- abilities, advanced proc filters, allow multiple unit rewards for a stage, improve localization, a lot of bugfixes
Allow syncing packs' save data, support a new extension for packs (.userpack), fix bugs
Make more fields compatible to language localization, add pack progression, (requires re-downloading asset.bcuzip file), bugfixes & tweaks
12.4 contents (requires downloading new asset.bcuzip file), (some) Custom Procs for talents, bugfixes
We're going to fucking kill you
Fix Pack Enemy Filter Bug

Reduce lag on collab/recurring/favorite filters, replace custom filter with pack filter on enemy search page, fix visual bugs for poison and def aura, fix atk share bug, use talented HP/ATK on unit search page
Implement way to allow multiple attacks in one frame, Custom BGEffect Spacer, Bugfixes and QoL stuff
Syncs upstream BCU branch updates (12.3 content & such), makes Background Preview accurate and Pack soul animations viewable, fix some big bad bugs, and more QoL

Fix export problems for soul and custom bg FX anims, can't deploy text display, errors on custombgeffect reading & sorting, atk ability settings not being updated, crashes on replay getter, level setting & copying effect/soul anims
